resources.string: Using Bixin server enables transaction information syncing among co-signers
I\'ve read and agreed (to terms of usage)

1. BixinKey is a hardware wallet for Bitcoin, where private keys will never have internet exposure 
 2. BixinKey is open-source 
 3. BixinKey has a display so that payment can be confirmed both ways, making your assets safer 
 4. BixinKey's card like design is more user friendly, making it easier to use or to keep 
 5. BixinKey uses military level chips 
 6. BixinKey does not support private key export. If you do not need multiple signers, you can set 1-of-2 multi-sig; so when a BixinKey is lost, you can use the backup BixinKey for transactions or asset transfers 
 7. We advise you to buy more than 2 BixinKeys, purchase address
Make hardware wallet touch the phone
1. Only hardware devices of Bixin\'s BixinKey are supported \n 2. Please make sure the phone supports NFC, and NFC permission has been given to the software \n 3. Please make the card touch the phone
Please set safety password for your BixinKey
Please re-enter the safety password you set
Make hareware wallet touch with phone
The existing transaction information can be obtained by inputting transaction message
Hardware wallet, with private keys never exposed online
Name format error, number of signatures required cannot be bigger than the number of co-signers
Wallet name, co-signer numbers, necessary signatures must all be filled out
Notice: the address supports only bitcoin depositing, other cryptos deposited to the address will be lost
Please confirm info below on BixinKey before tapping "OK" button
Wallet created, refer to image for your receiving address
Number of signatures cannot be bigger than number of co-signers
Number of co-signers cannot be less than number of signatures
Camera permission denied, cannot read QR code
You have turned on transaction auto syncing, other signers can receive the transaction via Bixin HD, or you can forward the transaction to other co-signers
Take screenshot and forward the QR code or copy the content and forward to other co-signers to finish signing
Please enable NFC in system Settings first!
Please set PIN code according to demonstrations on BixinKey
Transaction inormation too big to be shared by QR code
Inormation too big to be shared by QR code
No wallet for now, tap to add
Creating mutual wallet entails adding public keys of the 3 public managers
Creating mutual wallet entails adding public keys of the
For mutual wallet to work, 2 signatures out of 3 public managers will be required
Can use any of the 3 BixinKeys to authorize transactions
Needs to bind 3 BixinKeys, and any of the 3 devices can be used for transactions
Mutual managers do not own BixinKey?
Transaction needs enough confirmations on the main net to become valid
Or choose from backup of this device
Data transfer takes some time, please keep them together
New PIN code has been set
Reset to factory settings entails the following risks
1. Private keys will be erased after the reset
2. This BixinKey cannot be used to sign transactions of related wallet
This wallet does not keep any information. There is no way to retrieve the wallet. Please keep wallet password properly.
Please refer to PIN code backed up by BixinKey
Please choose the wallet used to generate mnemonic phrases
Please enter 12 mnemonic phrase in correct order
Please set number of mutual managers
Number of co-signers must not be bigger than number of mutual managers
All wallet-related info including private key is kept on mobile phone, to avoid asset loss due to losing your phone, please back up mnemonic phrases
Please copy the mnemonic phrases down on paper and keep it somewhere safe and private. Only mnemonic phrases can be used to recover the wallet
Please enter 12 mnemonic phrases in correct order
Public key format wrong, please try again
New transaction will be generated after acceleration; new transactions will need to be signed and propagated again!Refer to on-chain information for actual transaction execution!
Transaction does not support rbf functionality
Syncing servers only keep openly available info such as public keys, names, etc. No private keys or personal info will be stored
BixinKey uses open-source & decentralized Electrum nodes for transaction propagation and on-chain info retrieval
Select 3rd party service to get bitcoin price
Select block explorer to view on-chain information
1. Public information of a wallet can be obtained by searching the public key associated with the wallet saved in BixinKey on Bixin\'s server
2. Public information by definition includes no private info or private keys
3. Wallet imported needs to be used along with BixinKey
At least 8 digits, only numerals, upper case letters, lower cases letters, and standard symbols are allowed
Device does not keep any wallet key info for the user. There is no way to retrieve password. Please keep password in a safe and proper manner yourself
Wrong mnemonic phrases. Please try again
Turn on BixinKey, and put it close to your phone
Necessary permission request getting denied may affect your usage
Please turn on BixinKey, and confirm pairing code
Please enter the message to be signed
The signature information is consistent with the original public key information
Hide real IP using proxy server
Sorry! Failed to read. Try again！！！
I\'m sorry! Timeout reading, try again！！！
The hardware is in bootloader mode, which is not supported
Please confirm the hardware currently is in bootloader mode
Wallet is not activated, no need to restore factory settings
Wallet is not activated, PIN code cannot be modified
Using Bluetooth to connect to BixinKey
On status, can use Bluetooth to communicate with BixinKey
Failed to get device information, please try again later!!
Use any BixinKey to authorize transaction
Please put BixinKey device and phone together
Don\'t take away your phone during BixinKey\'s upgrade
Please confirm new PIN code on BixinKey
No need for confirmation on device
Found wallets of BixinKey\'s public keys. Please select and import
Enter any message to get signed
BixinKey is powered by Bixin, installed with Bixin\'s official firmware
BixinKey may have been compromised. Please contact sales staff
Bluetooth must be on to use this communication method
Please confirm device is in NFC mode
Hidden wallet does not store transaction record
Hidden wallet does not record any data in the App. To use hiden wallet, connect to BixinKey and enter special PIN code to unlock
Hidden wallet will enhance privacy of your assets
To create hidden wallet, activated BixinKey is needed
Please confirm the pin code on the hardware \n 2. Please remember the password displayed by BixinKey
Upgrade file should end with. zip or .bin
Only single signature is supported for signed messages
This transaction is not related to the current wallet
Please turn on the "Spend unconfirmed income" button in the settings to create the transaction
The wallet created from this xpub already exists. Name is
The current hardware state does not support hiding wallets
The wallet created from this seed already exists. Name is
Signing failed. Current wallet and device do not match
This xpub already exists, please replace it
This transaction is not related to the current wallet
Please keep your phone close to the BixinKey during the reading process
No official firmware is detected. Please use the official firmware
Please confirm the PIN code on the hardware
Data transmissing. Please keep BixinKey close to the phone
BixinKey activation failed, please try again
Please confirm the PIN on BixinKey and complete the activation
Use security chips to store private keys and sign
The wallet private key is randomly generated by BixinKey
Restore an existing wallet from BixinKey backup
Please complete the modification and confirm the new PIN code on BixinKey
Current BixinKey does not have permission to sign this transaction
Please change to the correct BixinKey for signing
Device is not a BixinKey. Please use BixinKey for signatures
Please keep your phone connected to BixinKey
Data transmission will take some time, please stay connected
BixinKey failed to restore factory settings
Use a proxy server to hide network traces
Back up your wallet now? You can also back up your wallet in Settings later.
Some wallets already exist, import complete
View the BixinKey extended public key
Please enter the password of the BixinKey backup
The original PIN is incorrect. Please try again
Please confirm the new PIN on BixinKey
Synchronization servers can back up and restore the mutual wallets, synchronize and sign transactions across multiple managers.

VII. AUTHORIZATION AND PROTECTION OF USER INFORMATION 
 VII.1 User information, which refers to: 
		（1）the public data that the User independently chooses to synchronized to the Bixin server when using the Platform service, including but not limited to storage address and transaction data; 
		（2）the server values on the User's browser that the Platform automatically receives and records when the User uses the Platform service or accesses the Platform, including but not limited to, data such as IP addresses and web page records requested by the User; 
		（3）data collected by the Platform on User's transactions on the platform, including but not limited to transaction records;但不限于交易记录； 
		（4）the User-related information obtained by the Platform through the blockchain network. 
 VII.2 The User agrees that Bixin can use a data collection device such as "Cookies" on some web pages of the Platform to automatically track some information about the User according to the User's behavior on the Platform. Under the premise of not disclosing the User's private information, the Platform has the right to analyze the whole User database and make commercial use of the User database. 
 VII.3 The User authorized Bixin shall provide the information provided by the User to the Platform, the information generated by the services of the Platform (including the information provided and generated before the signing of this Agreement), and the information collected by the Platform in accordance with this Agreement using for the Platform and its partners entrusted by the service to provide services, recommend products, carry out market research and information data analysis for the User. 
 VII.4 Bixin will protect the User information in accordance with relevant laws and regulations. The information provided by the User to Bixin as a result of the performance of this Agreement will not be maliciously sold or shared to any third-party except for the content and purpose stipulated in this Agreement. Bixin will also urge its partners to keep the above information confidential and take various measures to ensure information security. 
VIII. OWNERSHIP AND INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS 
 VIII.1 All content on the Platform, including pictures, files, information, data, platform architecture, platform screen arrangement, platform design, text and diagrams, software compilation, related source code and software, trademarks, etc. are owned by Bixin or other right holders in accordance with the law. Trademark rights, patent rights, copyrights and trade secrets are protected by national laws, regardless of whether they were formed before or after this Agreement. 
 VIII.2 Unless otherwise required by law, no unit or individual may illegally use, copy, reprint, quote, link, crawl or publicly publish Platform programs or contents in any way without the written permission of Bixin or other right holders, otherwise, Bixin shall have the right to pursue its legal liability. 
 VIII.3 The User may not download (except page cache) or modify the Platform or any part thereof without the expressly written consent of Bixin. The User may not resell or commercially exploit the Platform or its content or Platform services; may not collect and utilize product catalogs, descriptions and prices; may not make any derivative use of the Platform or its contents or services; and may not download or copy account information or use any data collection, Robots or similar data collection and extraction tool for other commercial interests. Systematic access to the contents of the Platform for the creation or editing of collections, assemblies, databases or directories of persons (whether through Robots, Spiders, automatic instruments or manual operations) directly or indirectly is strictly prohibited without the written permission of the Platform. In addition, the use of content and materials on the Platform for any purpose not expressly permitted by this Agreement is strictly prohibited. 
 VIII.4 Any service provided by the Platform the user using shall not be regarded as the transfer of any intellectual property rights to the User. It is the duty of the User to respect intellectual property rights. If there is any violation, the User shall bear legal liability for damages and other legal liability for Bixin. Bixin also has the right to take measures such as warning, suspension of service, cancellation of orders, prohibition of transactions, closure of accounts, permanent prohibition of registration, and so on. 
IX. WARNING 
 IX.1 Bixin does not make any express or implied warranties for the User to use the Platform services, including, but not limited to, the applicability, free of errors or omissions, continuity, accuracy, reliability, suitable for a particular purpose of the services provided by the Platform. At the same time, Bixin does not make any commitment or guarantee to the effectiveness, accuracy, correctness, reliability, quality, stability, integrity and timeliness of the technology and information involved in the services provided by the Platform. 
 IX.2 Whether or not to use Platform services is the User's personal decision and at his own risk and possible losses. Bixin does not make any express or implied guarantee for the market, value and price of digital assets. The User knows and understands the instability of the digital asset market, and the price and value of digital assets can fluctuate or collapse at any time. Trading digital assets is the User's personal free choice and decision, and bear his own risks and possible losses. 
 IX.3 Bixin does not provide any guarantee or condition to any user and/or any transaction, whether express, implied or legal. Bixin cannot and does not attempt to control the information published by the User or service parties, and the Platform does not undertake any form of certification and identification services for such information. The Platform cannot fully guarantee the authenticity, adequacy, reliability, accuracy, completeness and validity of the content of the Platform, and does not have to bear any legal liability arising therefrom. The User should rely on the independent judgment of the User to conduct the transaction, and the User should bear full responsibility for the judgment made by the User. 
 IX.4 The market view function provided by the Platform only captures the search results of the exchange rate information of digital assets of some exchanges, and does not represent the latest market or the best quotation. 
 IX.5 In the process of transfer, if there are similar abnormal information prompts such as "transaction failure" and "packing timeout", the User should reconfirm it through the relevant blockchain official channels or other blockchain query tools to avoid repeated transfers; otherwise, all losses and expenses arising therefrom shall be borne by the User. 
 IX.6 When creating or importing a storage, the User should make a secure backup of the Security Password, Private Key, Mnemonic Word and other information of the User's storage. The User should avoid using the following electronic backup methods: screenshots, e-mails, notepad applications in mobile phones, SMS, Wechat, QQ and other electronic backup methods. The User should copy Mnemonic Word, Keystore and other information in paper notepad. If the User does not save or back up the Security Password, Private Key, Mnemonic Word and other information, and if the User's mobile device is lost, the User's digital assets may be lost, and Bixin can not be recovered for the User. Any and all losses arising from the foregoing shall be borne by the User. 
 IX.7 The above does not reveal all the risks of the User trading through the Platform and the full situation of the market. Before making a trading decision, the User should have a comprehensive understanding of the relevant digital assets, make prudent decisions according to his own trading objectives, risk tolerance and asset status, and bear all the risks on his own. 
X. TERMINATION 
 X.1 The user has the right to apply to the Platform for cancellation of the registered account at any time, and the agreement shall be terminated from the date on which the Platform approves the cancellation of the registered account. 
 X.2 If the User dies or is declared dead, his rights and obligations under this Agreement shall be inherited by his heirs. If the User loses all or part of his capacity for civil rights or civil conduct, Bixin or its authorized subject shall have the right to dispose of the funds related to the User's account in accordance with valid legal documents (including effective court decisions, etc.) or the instructions of its legal guardian. If the heir or legal guardian decides to continue to perform this Agreement, this Agreement shall remain valid; otherwise, the heir or legal guardian shall apply to the Platform for cancellation of the account in accordance with this Agreement, and this Agreement shall be terminated from the date on which the Platform approves the cancellation of the User's account. 
 X.3 Bixin has the right to terminate all services of the Platform in accordance with this Agreement, which shall be terminated on the date of termination of all services of the Platform, and the withdrawal process shall be operated in accordance with the specific provisions of the Platform announcement. 
 X.4 After the termination of this Agreement, the User shall not have the right to require Bixin to continue to provide any services or perform any other obligations, including, but not limited to, requiring Bixin to retain or disclose any information in its original account to the User, forward any information that has not been read or sent to the User or a third-party. 
 X.5 The termination of this Agreement shall not affect the liability of the defaulting party before the termination of this Agreement, nor will it affect the performance of the contractual obligations after the termination of this Agreement. 
XI. JURISDICTION AND APPLICATION OF LAW 
 XI.1 The content, conclusion, implementation and interpretation of this Agreement and the settlement of disputes shall be subject to the laws of the People's Republic of China (excluding the laws of Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan). 
 XI.2 In the event of any dispute over the content or implementation of this Agreement, the two parties shall try their best to resolve it through friendly negotiation; if no negotiation is reached, the User agrees to submit the dispute or implementation to the Beijing General Assembly of the China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission for arbitration. 
XII. MISCELLANEOUS 
 XII.1 Bixin respects the legitimate rights of the User, this Agreement and all kinds of rules issued on this Platform are for better and more convenient services for the User. Please focus on reading and understanding the provisions of the agreement that are prominently marked in boldface, bold, etc. 
 XII.2 If any provision of this Agreement is determined to be unenforceable, invalid or illegal by any competent body, the validity of the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall not be affected. 
 XII.3 If any provision of this Agreement is wholly or partially invalid or unenforceable for any reason, it shall be deemed to be separable from this Agreement, and may be replaced by a new and effective provision as close as possible to the intention of the parties and capable of retaining the economic purposes required by this Agreement, in which case the other provisions of this Agreement shall remain fully valid and binding. 
 XII.4 Unless otherwise agreed by other provisions of this Agreement, nothing in this Agreement shall be deemed to have created, implied or otherwise regarded Bixin as the agent, trustee or other representative of the User. 
 XII.5 An exemption for breach of contract, or a waiver of any of the provisions of this Agreement, shall take effect only after the waiver has been signed in written by the abiding party or the non-waiver party. Any exemption for breach of contract under this Agreement shall not be determined or construed as an exemption of the abiding party for subsequent breach or other breach; failure to exercise any right or relief shall not be construed in any way as a waiver of such right or relief. 
 XII.6 If the User has any questions about this Agreement, the User can contact Bixin through [*]. Bixin will explain and descripte the relevant provisions and conditions for the User in detail and reply to the User's questions.
To restore the backup, please restore the factory settings first
The hardware does not support the creation of hidden wallets

After enabling quick payment, if a single transaction is less than the set limit, there is no need to verify the PIN or to confirm. After repeatedly using the Quick pay for a set number of times, the system will automatically close it. (Note: When using non-secure chip, the system will check the PIN on the first payment if PIN protection is set.)
Software wallets can be recovered from backup after deletion
History wallets that have been created with BixinKey and can be import Now
You need to enable the sync server to import the history wallet
Please select a custom file first
Incorrect password entry or incorrect key
Network connection failed, please try again
BixinKeys. Use any one of them to authorize transactions. Setting multiple BixinKeys as backup will keep your assets from being lost due to losing the only BixinKey
Please confirm and complete the operation on BixinKey
In order to scanning ble device Android 6+, Location service is needed
Your phone is not support NFC, please use other way
Please check your network and ensure it\'s usable
Please confirm and complete the remaining process on BixinKey
BixinKey private key seed has been saved to the phone with pin code encryption. Please remember the current pin code.
Only numbers and letters can be entered
It is detected that the wallet is not backed up. For the sake of your fund security, please use it after backup
no backup, please use after backup
After acceleration, the miner\'s fee is

After acceleration new transactions will be created for unconfirmed transactions; new transactions need to be signed and broadcast again! The actual completion of the transaction is subject to the chain!
Device does not support NFC function!
Please retouch the phone with BixinKey
BixinKey activation set pin code and use after backup
